title: Accomplices
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Nico-chan, Rin is tired nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You’re tired? But it hasn’t even been 15 minutes since we started.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>You say that, but you haven’t made any progress on your assignment either nya....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Nico is doing it properly, alright! Each and every question on my assignment is difficult!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Okay, Rin gets it, so let’s just take a break together~ Nico-cha~n!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Geez, you aren’t listening to me at all, are you.... *Sigh*, if we take a break in the first 10 minutes, we’ll get yelled at by Umi again, you know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>We just need to have our notebooks open when Umi-chan comes back to the clubroom! Come on, Nico-chan, let’s play the game that Kotori-chan told me about the other day together nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>*Sigh*, fine. But Rin, promise me this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You and Nico are accomplices, so if we get scolded, we get scolded together, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
